spatial_accuracy.notes: General layout is captured, but there is a major door orientation error at the main entrance (Chandler & Joey's Apartment) and a significant window placement error on the right wall of the living area which is missing in the render. Bathroom wall alignment near Rachel's room is slightly distorted.

structural_fidelity.notes: Structural integrity is mostly maintained, but the kitchen has been modified from a 'U-shape' to an 'L-shape' with a separate island/counter that does not match the floor plan's continuous cabinet layout.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture placement is mostly accurate to the blueprint labels, though the kitchen appliance placement (stove/sink) shifted positions.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Excellent isometric execution. Lighting and materials are cohesive and clear, providing a high-quality visualization despite structural deviations.

detected_errors.description: The main entry door orientation is incorrect; it should swing inward towards the wall, not outward into the hall.
Missing window on the far right wall of the living room/Monica's bedroom segment.
The kitchen layout is misplaced; it should be a continuous counter along the wall, but it has been split into an island and a wall-mounted unit.
Proportion distortion in the hallway width leading to the bedrooms compared to the open living space.
